mapper.select: SELECT mno, mid, mnick, mname, mmail, mphone, mbirth, mclass FROM member WHERE NOT mclass = 0 ORDER BY mno DESC
SELECT pno, mno, pdiv, pname, pbirth, pnum, pdel, petc FROM pet WHERE NOT pdel = 5 ORDER BY mno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet(mno, pdiv, pname, pbirth, pnum, pdel, petc) VALUES(#{mno },#{pdiv},#{pname},#{pbirth},#{pnum},#{pdel},#{petc})
